## Reminder about tidy evaluation

If you create a function where you provide column names things get complicated

```{r}
make_sleep_chart <- function(y_axis){
  
  msleep %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sleep_total,
             y = y_axis)) +
  geom_point()
  
}
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
make_sleep_chart(y_axis = sleep_rem)
# Error in FUN(X[[i]], ...) : object 'sleep_rem' not found
```
